title: Sush Machida Gaikotsu
text:
Sush Machida Gaikotsu (Sush Machida, born in Maebashi, Japan), is a contemporary Japanese artist. He currently lives and works in <a href="Las%20Vegas%20Valley">Las Vegas</a>, <a href="Nevada">Nevada</a>, U.S.A. His artwork has been exhibited internationally. Machida received his M.F.A. (2002) from the University of Nevada, Las Vegas. He is represented by Western Project, Los Angeles, among others.
Artwork.
"<a href="Los%20Angeles%20Times">Los Angeles Times</a>" art critic <a href="David%20Pagel">David Pagel</a> wrote "It's a rare instance of less-is-more magic, when a strictly limited number of judicious decisions intensifies the effect of the whole. <a href="Pop%20art">Pop art</a> never looked more scorchingly gorgeous or wickedly <a href="Zen">Zen</a>."
